content.rendered:
ELEVATED ACTIVEWEAR

The elevated active wear trend is only getting cooler with highly coveted designer sweatshirts and must-have dad sneakers.

What better way to feel comfortable and still be a trend setter by mixing elevated high quality activewear with bold accessories that are very wearable in your every day life. 

We love a good quality cool sweatshirt paired with high shine leggings and a bold shoe. You can pair this look with an oversized blazer for an instant I mean business but I still love fashion look.

Both looks are from FWRD.COM. Shoes from Balenciaga. Luxury candles and lipstick are by yours truly D’Lashes.com. Blue bag is from the new Jacquemus collection. Gold earring are YSL.

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and safety!
